before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"3fvse","text":"The Phenocycler Fusion system must be setup and calibrated by an installation engineer.  Akoya Biosciences will provide a list of materials required for training.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"438te","text":"This protocol describes multiplexed immunofluorescent (MxF) staining and imaging of FFPE lung tissue sections utilizing the Phenocycler-Fusion platform (Akoya Biosciences).  The approach is based on the CODEX multiplexed immunofluorescence staining technology developed by Garry Nolan and colleagues (1). The protocol is closely aligned with the attached Phenocycler-Fusion User Guide provided by Akoya (2). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"71nb4","text":"The protocol includes A) FFPE lung tissue section preparation, B) Labeling of lung tissue sections with antibody-barcode conjugates, C) Barcode-Reporter plate and experiment design, D) Multiplexed imaging and analysis, E) Reference for H\u0026E stain to follow MxF and F) Reference to custom antibody conjugation. Thus, the protocol is designed to provide information regarding specific reagents (i.e., antibodies), conditions (i.e., dilutions), and procedures used in multiplexed immunofluorescent staining of lung tissue.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7tkmi","text":"Pipette 245 μl of each reporter mix into a well of a light-opaque 96 well microtiter plate (Akoya Biosciences) according to the Experimental Design developed in the experimental design app. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1geah","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9n0f9","text":"Also, pipette 245 ul reporter stock solution (blanks) into two wells of row H to create 2 blank wells. {"blocks":[{"key":"17h5j","text":"Label an opaque microtainer for each well, each well = one imaging cycle of the imaging run. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
